Create a personalized soundscapes app that uses AI to analyze user preferences and create unique audio experiences based on their mood or activity.
Develop an augmented reality game where players use headphones as controllers to navigate through a virtual world.
Design a wearable device that uses headphones to monitor brain waves and provide real-time feedback on stress levels.
Create an interactive storytelling experience where users wear headphones and listen to a story while being immersed in a fully realized 3D environment.
